title: England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland described and abridged with ye historic relation of things worthy memory from a farr larger voulume done by Iohn Speed.
author: Speed, John, 1552?-1629.
publisher: [J. Dawson] and are to bee sould at Georg Humble at the White-horse in popeshead Alley,
notes: An abridgement of: Speed, John.  The theatre of the empire of Great Britaine, the text of which is mainly based on: Camden, William.  Britannia.
Most maps were engraved by Pieter van den Keere.--STC.
A2v line 14 of text ends: for our.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
